title: FPS Drop
body: Does anyone else experience FPS drop just by simply pushing tab while in game? I have no clue if this is related at all to league current problem but hopefully it could help put them in the right direction to find a solution to this FPS drop problem.

replies.body: There could be assets with the tab infoscreen that could cause issues, but it might just be a coincidence.  Frame drops like this can happen for a variety of reasons like bad drivers or game files, so it's hard to say with just that.  My suggestion would be to run through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot as well as tune up your pc.  Hopefully, that does the trick!
